Name: Sir Charles Punch
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Cognac-laced citrusy wine flavours make this somewhat reminiscent of boozy, chilled mulled wine.
History: Adapted from the following recipe in the 1949 Esquire's Handbook For Hosts book.
Nutrition: One serving of Sir Charles Punch contains 147 calories
